summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Cloud Surf is a light-as-air water cream moisturizer quenches & rebalances normal-to-combo skin without feeling sticky or heavy. Its floofy perfection minimizes the appearance of pores, helps rebalance oils, leaves skin looking smooth, nourished, and oh-so-natural, even¬†under¬†makeup
details: DetailsBenefitsNormal-to-combination skin.Fragrance freeKey IngredientsHibiscus Extract helps control sebum production.Celery Seed Extract helps minimize the appearance of pores.Syringa Vulgaris (Lilac) Extract mattifies and equalizes the tone of acne-prone skin.Formulated WithoutDenatured alcoholsParabensArtificial colorAdded fragranceItem 2611778How To UseEvenly apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin morning and evening.Precautions: Use only as directed.IngredientsWater, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isododecane, Maltodextrin, Syringa Vulgaris (Lilac) Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Extract, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fructose, Sorbitan Isostearate, 1,2 Hexanediol, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Tocopherol, Polylysine, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Evenly apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin morning and evening.Precautions: Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: great for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I have acne prone skin and always look for lightweight moisturizers that won't make me too oily or break me out. this moisturizer is fragrance free and doesn't clog my pores. leaves skin with a nice, dewy look without being heavy or sticky. just taking one star off because it's almost too lightweight and feels more like a toner than a moisturizer!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again I literally have it in my Ulta bag
reviews.comments: Again amazing product so lightweight on the skin and I love it. Because I and 9 and it's hard to find a kids mostuizer so I love this one Bubble did an amazing job with this cloud surf  water cream moisturizer

reviews.headline: I use this everyday and will keep using it
reviews.comments: This is a light weight moisturizer. I can tell you so much! My skin was so dry before I started using this. And now it's glowing in moisture. I love how it has the push dispenser and how it makes a flower. I have oily skin with acne and this has helped balance my oil levels and die down my acne. Thank you for making this!

reviews.comments: Pills terribly and does not absorb into skin. It forms a film over my face without actually moisturizing. Waste of money and time.

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: Love wearing this under my makeup! Feels really good. Will repurchase.

reviews.headline: Ive been using this since September 2023
reviews.comments: As the title says, I've been using this moisturizer since September 2023, it works pretty well, leaves my skin moisturized without feeling greasy and doesn't clog my pores. That said, I wish the containers were a little bigger so that it lasts longer before buying a new container or that there are refills we can buy so we can keep using the same container instead of having to buy a new one every time it runs out.

reviews.headline: Bubble cloud surf!
reviews.comments: My bestie recommended this product and I love it! My face already looks healthier and the packaging is cute. Im so stupid though because I thought the little white circle that looks like a seal on it was a seal, so I tried to rip it out. Turns out its supposed to stay.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I love this moisturizer. I had originally purchased the slam dunk moisturizer but felt it didn't match my skincare needs. I knew they had two other options for moisturizers and because they have, what I feel like is a great breakdown and explanation of each moisturizer, I was able to narrow it down to this one, the cloud surf. I have sensitive combo skin now (I used to have normal skin and didn't need any attention or fuss ) but just in the last two years I've been working on keeping my newly developed hormonal acne under control, so finding a good moisturizer was critical. I had high hopes for this one because for me it checked all my boxes: lightweight, unscented, no dyes, "clean", extremely affordable, AND there were over 500 reviews with overwhelmingly positive reactions to the product.. 
After trying it I found Cloud Surf to be lightweight, it absorbs well, it's easy to layer with my other products and I feel like it sufficiently moisturizes without clogging up my skin. I've been using these products for a little over a year now and I'm very happy. I actually just recently recommended a handful of these products to a friend of mine (along with a few others that I swear by) because she has sensitive skin and I genuinely think these products are worth trying. I know all people are different, all skin is different, everyone responds to things differently. But if you're looking for some new basic skincare products, products to create a simple routine or you want all the steps, Bubble is a great place to start. Their products make up 80% of my daily routine. Bubble makes up the majority of my in-between steps. And my skin looks GREAT now. It took a minute to find what worked for me, but I really like these products and I will use them as long as the formulas don't change and/or cheapen. I even just this last week recommended this moisturizer to a friend of mine and she also struggles with combo acne prone skin and scarring. Some of these products have little fixed some of my discoloration and scarring from the hormonal acne from two years ago. Totally worth trying.
faceoff_positive.headline: great all around lightweight moisturizer

faceoff_negative.comments:
The layout of my skin is as follows: dry, sensitive, acne prone. What I CANT use: PGA, HA, AHA's, Niacinamide, Shea Butter. After thorough research, I bought this product. I've been using this product for exactly 22 days (April 6th 2025). Within these 22 days my skin had had a massive improvement with my acne. Skin texture is smoother and more even. HOWEVER, something in this product is irritating my lips horrendously. Within the past 22 days I've had 4 irritation bumps appear just on my lips. After the first one appeared on April 15th, I immediately scheduled a visit with my dermatologist fearing the bump was something more sinister. Everything sinister was ruled out. She stated that it was likely a fordyce spot or a bump from something irritating my lip. At the time, I didnt equate the bump to the moisturizer. It went away after 5 days. But then another one appeared just two days later and I was at a loss. Ive NEVER had any issues with my
Lips. I couldnt understand why all of the sudden my lips looked like that. Terrified, i cautiously put on this moisturizer in the morning, avoiding my lips, and I havent had any appear for a week and a half. Yesterday, in a rush I applied this moisturizer and forgot to be careful around my lips. I woke up this morning with TWO bumps on my lips‚Ä¶ unfortunately confirming that this product is the culprit of the bumps. I will be returning.
faceoff_negative.headline: Caused irritation on my lips
